ble-role-observer.help: Include observer BLE role support (scanning for and processing advertising packets).

ble-role-broadcaster.help: Include broadcaster BLE role support (sending advertising packets).

ble-role-central.help: Include central BLE role support (initiates connections), depends on observer role.

ble-role-peripheral.help: Include peripheral BLE role support (accepts connections), depends on broadcaster role.

ble-feature-gatt-client.help: Include Gatt Client BLE role support (requests remote operations on attributes), depends on peripheral and central role.

ble-feature-gatt-server.help: Include Gatt Server BLE role support (executes operations on stored attributes), depends on peripheral or central role.

ble-feature-security.help: Include security support (key management), depends on peripheral or central role.

ble-feature-secure-connections.help: Include secure connections support, depends on the security feature.

ble-feature-signing.help: Include signing support (signed attribute writes), depends on the security feature.

ble-feature-whitelist.help: Include whitelist support (peer filtering), depends on the security feature.

ble-feature-privacy.help: Include privacy support (random resolvable addresses), depends on the security feature.

ble-feature-extended-advertising.help: Include extended advertising support (advertising sets, secondary channels).

ble-feature-periodic-advertising.help: Include periodic advertising support, depends on the extended advertising feature.
